basics.name: Qifan Zhang
basics.label: Incoming MS in Stat & DS @ Yale <- BS in Stat @ Nanjing University
basics.summary: Qifan earned Bachelor degree from Nanjing University this summer and he will continue his study at Yale University. While his major is statistics and data science, he also has great interest in financial mathematics. This personal website depends on the hugo theme gruvbox. A big thanks to the creators!

work.name: Lingjun Investment, LLP
work.description: A Quantitative PE firm in China
work.summary: My main responsibility was to extract signals or features from high-frequency stock data e.g. limit order book data and tick data and implement them in both Python and C++ (time complexity of the C++ implementations is of great importance). Our team used these features to train machine learning models (ensembles of LGBM/DL/RL) and generate high-frequency trading signals (from 100ms to 3s).
highlights: Implemented ~50 high-frequency features in both Python and C++ and improved over 0.05 IC (a popular metrics in factor models) of the final model.
Developed time-series and cross-sectional operator classes in C++ on the company's new high-frequency trading platfrom to support our models' deployment.

work.name: Singapore Management University
work.summary: I worked with Prof. Changcheng Song (https://sites.google.com/site/songchch02/) on house price prediction in Singapore using machine learning-based AVM model.
highlights: Our models can achieved <2.5% MAPE on test set (2023 Jan and Feb house transactions in Singapore).

work.name: Huawei
work.summary: I worked in the data team of Customer Business Group and my main responsibility was to design and develop persona tags to support the company's advertisement business.
highlights: Contributed 20+ accurate features to feature stores in the company's MLOps platform.
Designed and developed 5 persona tags related to interest in the Huawei Card and other financial products, improving the click rate for Huawei Card advertisements about 5 times.
